modName: Friendly to All Faction - Modder Resource
summary: This .esp contains one faction not found in the original game. This faction is friendly or allies with every other faction in the game.
descriptionHtml:
This .esp contains one faction not found in the original game. This faction is friends or allies with every other faction in the game. When this faction is properly applied to an NPC it will cause them to be ignored by normally hostile NPCs and creatures. 

The Faction is named FriendlyToAllFaction in the editor.

~~~~~~~~
Examples 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11575]Eternal Bunny Pet[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13036]Oblivious Horses[/url]


~~~~~~~~~~~~
Installation

Simply extract the .7zip folder and add the .esp file to your /Data folder in your Skyrim directory or download with the NMM.

~~~~~~~~~
Tips

Do not change the name of the FriendlyToAllFaction on the Faction form. It will break it for some reason.
author: KahjiitRaj
